name: miscellaneous
description: Plugins/libraries for tools that don't fit anywhere else.

plugins.name: guard-puppet-lint
plugins.description: As Puppet manifest files change, run puppet-lint on them.

plugins.name: node-puppetdbquery
plugins.description: A JavaScript version of the puppetdbquery module for puppet.

plugins.name: pypuppetdb
plugins.description: Python library for working with the PuppetDB API
